quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Install the embedded web service package and start managing your local PCode instance.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Built with security in mind. Your data stays on your machine.

dependencyManagement.title: Dependency Management
dependencyManagement.description: Manage embedded web service packages and system dependencies

tips.title: Tips
tips.description: Keep your dependencies up to date for the best performance and security.

versionManagement.title: Version Management
versionManagement.description: Install, switch, and manage Hagicode Server versions
versionManagement.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall this version?
versionManagement.confirmReinstall: Are you sure you want to reinstall this package? This will delete the cache and installed version, then download and install again.

info.title: About Version Management
info.description: Version management allows you to install multiple Hagicode Server versions and switch between them. Only versions with all dependencies satisfied can be activated.

dialog.reinstallDescription: This will delete the cache and installed version, then download and install again. Do you want to continue?
dialog.uninstallDescription: Are you sure you want to uninstall this version? This action cannot be undone.
